nodes.text: The K26 explosive antivehicle rocket was manufactured by Merr-Sonn Munitions, Inc., for use in wrist rocket launchers such as the Kelvarek Consolidated Arms MM9 rocket system. It was capable of a reaching a target within 100 meters, and had a blast radius of two meters, within which it caused shrapnel damage upon impact. The wrist rockets cost 500 credits each and were slightly more powerful than standard fragmentation grenades. The K26 explosive antivehicle rocket was in use at some point before the year 0 ABY, however it was restricted to military usage.

The K26 explosive antivehicle rocket is mentioned briefly in the Arms & Equipment Guide for Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars Roleplaying Game, a sourcebook released in 2002 and written by Jeff Grubb and Owen K.C. Stephens.
